about_the_game:
This is the free version of Submarine Survivor, an exciting roguelite action game that will challenge your strategic skills and reflexes. Pilot a submarine and face hordes of sea creatures as you navigate and survive various challenges.

Exploration and Survival

Face waves of sea creatures in a dark and mysterious ocean. Each run offers a map with mission nodes that you must complete before facing the final boss.

Roguelite With Short Missions

Each mission lasts about 10 minutes, allowing for quick but action-packed gameplay. Your progress is saved between missions, accumulating upgrades and resources to prepare you for the final boss encounter.

Submarines and Upgrades

In this version, you can try the first submarine and learn some passive upgrades. You can test all available weapons and chips without restrictions.

Difficulty Levels and Boss Battles

In this version, you can explore the first difficulty level and face the first boss.

Crafting System

Collect resources during your explorations to craft powerful items that will help you survive. Upgrade these items and customize their attributes to maximize their combat effectiveness.

In the full version, you'll find:

  • All submarines with their unique characteristics.
  • All passive upgrades.
  • All difficulty levels, with modifiers to make each run a new challenge.
  • Battles with all bosses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dive into the ocean's depths, face fearsome sea creatures, and collect their experience crystals. In this roguelite action game, upgrade your submarines with various combinations of weapons and chips. Become the Lord of the Ocean!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
